masterdetails.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,`staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values`.user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('Office Room No:',office_room_num) as `office_room_num`, CONCAT('Phone Extension :',office_phone_ext) as office_phone_ext , CONCAT('E-mail :',email_id) as Email , CONCAT('Designation:',staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.Designation) as Designation FROM staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values LEFT JOIN staff_profile_report_v0_values ON `staff_profile_report_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid LEFT JOIN entity_document_master ON entity_document_master.entity_id=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_report_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.entity_type='staff'

personal_details.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('Focus Area: ',focus_area), CONCAT('Research Interests: ',research_interests) as research_interests, CONCAT('Teaching Interest: ',teaching_interests) as teaching_interests , CONCAT('Positions Held: ',positions_held) as positions_held FROM staff_profile_personal_details_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_personal_details_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_personal_details_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_personal_details_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='personal_details'

qualification.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution `institution` , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, entity_document_master.public_record, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, course_name, staff_profile_qualification_v0_values.institution as institution_name, staff_profile_qualification_v0_values.location as location_name FROM staff_profile_qualification_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_qualification_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_qualification_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_qualification_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='qualification'

awards.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`,entity_document_master.document_id, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('',award_name,'') as 'award_name', CONCAT('From ',agency_name) as 'agency_name', receiving_month_year , IF(staff_profile_awards_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_awards_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_awards_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_awards_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_awards_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_awards_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='awards'

journal_papers.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.document_id, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('',paper_title,'') as 'paper_title', general_master.fld_value as 'journal_name', author1,volume,issue_no,month_year, IF(staff_profile_journal_papers_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_journal_papers_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_journal_papers_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_journal_papers_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid AND journal_type='National' INNER JOIN general_master ON general_master.id=staff_profile_journal_papers_v0_values.journal_name AND category='Journal' INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_journal_papers_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_journal_papers_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='journal_papers'

training.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('',training_name,'') as 'training_name', CONCAT('Period :',duration_from,' to ',duration_to) as 'Period', CONCAT(' at ',staff_profile_training_v0_values.location) as 'location_name' , IF(staff_profile_training_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_training_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_training_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_training_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_training_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_training_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='training'

projects.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, project_status,CONCAT('',project_title,'') as 'project_title', CONCAT('Start on ',start_date) as 'start_date', CONCAT('for ',duration) as 'duration' , amount, CONCAT('associated with ',general_master.fld_value) as 'department_name', abstract , IF(staff_profile_projects_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_projects_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_projects_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_projects_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `general_master` ON staff_profile_projects_v0_values.project_center_department =`general_master`.id AND `general_master`.category='Department' INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_projects_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_projects_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='projects'

thesis.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, choose, CONCAT('',thesis_title,'','',project_title,'') as 'title' , CONCAT(IF(staff_profile_thesis_v0_values.thesis_url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_thesis_v0_values.thesis_url,''),"") ,' ',IF(staff_profile_thesis_v0_values.project_url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_thesis_v0_values.thesis_url,''),"")) url FROM staff_profile_thesis_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_thesis_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_thesis_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_thesis_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='thesis'

professional_body.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('',fld_value,'') as 'professional_body_name', membership_from, membership_to , IF(staff_profile_professional_body_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_professional_body_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_professional_body_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_professional_body_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN general_master ON general_master.id= staff_profile_professional_body_v0_values.professional_body_name AND category='Professional_Body_Name' INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_professional_body_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_professional_body_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='professional_body'

consultancy_offered.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('',client_name,'') as 'client_name', duration_from,duration_to , IF(staff_profile_consultancy_offered_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_consultancy_offered_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_consultancy_offered_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_consultancy_offered_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_consultancy_offered_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_consultancy_offered_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='consultancy_offered'

governance.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id, entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('',committee_name,'') as 'committee_name', school_name, CONCAT(' from ',service_dates_from) as 'service_dates_from', CONCAT(' to ',service_dates_to) as 'service_dates_to', IF(staff_profile_governance_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_governance_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_governance_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_governance_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_governance_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_governance_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='governance'

review_committees.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT(fld_value,' of ') as 'Role', CONCAT('',title,'') as 'title', CONCAT(' from ',appointed_month_year ) as 'appointed_month_year', IF(staff_profile_review_committees_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_review_committees_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_review_committees_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_review_committees_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `general_master` ON staff_profile_review_committees_v0_values.role_played =`general_master`.id AND `general_master`.category='Role_Played' INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_review_committees_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_review_committees_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='review_committees'

community_service.query: SELECT staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.idf,user_full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.full_name, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university_id,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.university, staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution_id ,staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.institution , staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.department, entity_document_master.number, `entity_document_master`.`approved_yesno`, entity_document_master.`approved_by`, DATE_FORMAT(entity_document_master.`approved_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %H:%i') approved_date, entity_document_master.document_id,entity_document_master.entity_type, entity_document_master.public_record, CONCAT('',event_name,'') as 'event_name', CONCAT(' at ',staff_profile_community_service_v0_values.location) as 'location_name', CONCAT(' on ',activity_month_year) as 'activity_month_year' , IF(staff_profile_community_service_v0_values.url!="",CONCAT('',staff_profile_community_service_v0_values.url,''),"") url FROM staff_profile_community_service_v0_values INNER JOIN `staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values` ON `staff_profile_community_service_v0_values`.idf=staff_profile_masterdetails_v0_values.userid INNER JOIN `entity_document_master` ON entity_document_master.`entity_id`=staff_profile_community_service_v0_values.idf AND entity_document_master.number=staff_profile_community_service_v0_values.number AND entity_document_master.`entity_type`='community_service'
